item.description:
Do you ever think about the real purpose of your life?

Do you wonder about the meaning of the choices you've made?

Do you sometimes feel connected to a higher reality?

Part workshop, part discussion, in this informal, morning program Allan and Sandy will lead you through a selection of questions to help you identify aspects of your life that lie beneath every day awareness.

Learn how to "take the questions inside" and open yourself to the answers. We will also spend time in meditation and experience the clarity it brings. We hope you'll join us.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in Nordic Hall to the right of the entrance

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: What's Your Spiritual IQ? (Take the test.)
